user.title: Verbinden Sie sich mit Ihrem Landroid Cloud-Konto

multizone_distances.description: Set multizone distance array in meters. 0 = Disabled. Format: 15, 80, 120, 155
multizone_distances.name: Multi zone distances

raindelay.description: Regenverzögerung einstellen. Zeit zwischen 0 und 300 Minuten. 0 = Deaktiviert
raindelay.name: Regenverzögerung

timeextension.description: Set time extension. Extension in % ranging from -100 to 100
timeextension.name: Time extension

runtime.description: Run time in minutes before returning to charging station
runtime.name: Run time

schedule.description: Set or change the schedule of the mower

friday_boundary.description: Should we start this schedule by cutting the boundary (edge/border cut)?
friday_boundary.name: Freitag, Kantenschnitt

friday_end.description: When should the schedule stop on fridays?
friday_end.name: Freitag, Ende

monday_boundary.description: Should we start this schedule by cutting the boundary (edge/border cut)?
monday_boundary.name: Montag, Kantenschnitt

monday_end.description: When should the schedule stop on mondays?
monday_end.name: Montag, Ende

saturday_boundary.description: Should we start this schedule by cutting the boundary (edge/border cut)?
saturday_boundary.name: Samstag, Kantenschnitt

saturday_end.description: When should the schedule stop on saturdays?
saturday_end.name: Samstag, Ende

sunday_boundary.description: Should we start this schedule by cutting the boundary (edge/border cut)?
sunday_boundary.name: Sonntag, Kantenschnitt

sunday_end.description: When should the schedule stop on sundays?
sunday_end.name: Sonntag, Ende

thursday_boundary.description: Should we start this schedule by cutting the boundary (edge/border cut)?
thursday_boundary.name: Donnerstag, Kantenschnitt

thursday_end.description: When should the schedule stop on thursdays?
thursday_end.name: Donnerstag, Ende

tuesday_boundary.description: Should we start this schedule by cutting the boundary (edge/border cut)?
tuesday_boundary.name: Dienstag, Kantenschnitt

tuesday_end.description: When should the schedule stop on tuesdays?
tuesday_end.name: Dienstag, Ende

wednesday_boundary.description: Should we start this schedule by cutting the boundary (edge/border cut)?
wednesday_boundary.name: Mittwoch, Kantenschnitt

wednesday_end.description: When should the schedule stop on wednesdays?
wednesday_end.name: Mittwoch, Ende

schedule.name: Set or update schedule

send_raw.description: Send a raw JSON command to the device

json.description: Data to send, formatted as valid JSON
json.name: JSON data

send_raw.name: Send RAW command

setzone.description: Set which zone to be mowed next

zone.description: Sets the zone number, ranging from 0 to 3, to be mowed next
zone.name: Zone

setzone.name: Set zone

torque.description: Set wheel torque. Ranging from -50% to 50%
torque.name: Wheel torque
